alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; Jemez Mountains; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Southwest Mountains; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 14 at 9:46PM MST until December 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Mountains, West Central Plateau, Jemez Mountains, and San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles along Interstate 40 and U.S. Highway 60.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; Jemez Mountains; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Southwest Mountains; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau
